categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Patrick O'Kane (born December 15, 1969) is an Irish actor who portrayed Tritt Opan in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. Other roles of note include the recurring role of Francesco Gonzaga in the historical fiction drama series The Borgias, and a guest appearance in the Game of Thrones episode "Valar Morghulis", where he played the Faceless Man Jaqen H'ghar after the character had changed his appearance.
